price: Улар орасидаги ойни нур, қуёшни эса чироқ айлади.
arabic: وَجَعَلَ ٱلۡقَمَرَ فِيهِنَّ نُورٗا وَجَعَلَ ٱلشَّمۡسَ سِرَاجٗا

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wajaʿala al-qamara fīhinna nūran wajaʿala al-shamsa sirājan
